IzmenenieUchetaNDSPriVyborePobeditelya: • Change of VAT accounting when choosing a winner
IzmenenieVidaZaprosaPoSostavuUchastnikov: • Changing the type of request according to the composition of participants
IzmenenieOkonchaniyaRaundaPodachiPredloz: • Changing the end of the proposal round
IzmeneniePravilaIzmeneniyaTsenyPriPodach: • Changing the rule for changing the price when submitting an offer by participants
IzmenenieMinimalnogoShagaIzmeneniyaTseny: • Changing the minimum price change step
IzmenenieObemaPredlozheniyaUchastnika: • Changing the scope of the participant's offer
IzmenenieVremeniAvtomaticheskogoProdleni: • Changing the time of the automatic extension of the round after filing
IzmenenieAvtomaticheskogoProdleniyaRaund: • Changing the automatic extension of the round after filing
UstanovlenoTrebovaniePodachiPredlozheniy: • Established requirement to submit proposals only from verified suppliers
SnyatoTrebovaniePodachiPredlozheniyTolko: • The requirement to submit proposals only from verified suppliers has been removed.
IzmenenDokumentDlyaProkhozhdeniyaPredkva: • Changed document for prequalification / NDA: {PreviousValue} to {CurrentValue}
ZamenaGruppyVoprosovPreviousValueNaCurre: • Replacing a group of questions: {PreviousValue} with {CurrentValue}
DobavlenyTrebovaniyaKUchastnikuIUsloviya: Added requirements for the participant and the conditions of the request
UdalenyTrebovaniyaKUchastnikuIUsloviyamZ: Removed participant requirements and request conditions
IzmenenyTrebovaniyaKUchastnikuIUsloviyam: Changed the requirements for the participant and the conditions of the request
DobavlenaSpetsifikatsiyaTovarovIUslug: Added specification of goods and services
UdalenaSpetsifikatsiyaTovarovIUslug: Removed specification of goods and services
IzmenenaSpetsifikatsiyaTovarovIUslug: Changed the specification of goods and services
FieldChanged: • Changed the field in the description of the purchasing item: {PreviousValue} to {CurrentValue}
MaxAlternativeProposalCountChanged: • The ability to submit alternative proposals has been changed
IzmenenieOrientirovochnogoSrokaPodvedeni: • Changes in the approximate deadline for summing up
AcceptanceExpired: The call for proposals has ended. Check the relevance and update the submitted commercial offer.
AcceptanceExpiringBroadcast: The call for proposals ends in 48 hours.
ChangedProcedure: The customer has made changes to the request. Check the relevance of your offer!
FileAddedToAlternativeProposal: The participant has added a document to the proposal (Alternative {ProposalNumber}).
FileAddedToProposal: The participant has added a document to the offer.
FinishRoundProcedure: The client has completed the proposal round. Check the relevance and update the submitted commercial offer.
NdaAccepted: The application for participation in the request has been approved, you can review the request and submit a proposal.
NdaRejected: The application for participation in the request was rejected. Reason: "{Comment}".
NdaSubmitted: The prequalification / NDA in the request has been submitted.
NewParticipantWelcome: Welcome! Questions on request are discussed in this chat.
ParticipantBlocked: The customer has suspended your participation in the request
ParticipantUnBlocked: The customer has resumed your participation in the request
ProcedureCanceled: The customer canceled the request. Thanks to all participants!
ProcedureEndedBroadcast: Request completed. Thanks to all participants!
ProcedureEndedLooser: The customer has not chosen you for further cooperation on the subject of the request, thank you for your participation.
ProcedureEndedWinner: Congratulations! The customer has chosen you for further cooperation on the subject of the request. Details are on the Query Totals tab.
ProcedureProlongated: The deadline for submission of proposals has been extended by {ProlongationTermInMinutes} min. in connection with the submission of the proposal by the participant.
ProcedureStagePublished: The customer announced a new request stage: {Comment}.
ProposalGoDraftDueToMajorChange: Your offer has been rejected due to a request change or a new milestone being announced. Please update the offer.
RefuseNotification: A refusal to participate in the request was recorded. The participant may change his mind and return to participation.
RisePermitted: You can change the price of your bid that violates the bidding rule once.
RoundProcedure: Attention, a new round of proposals has been announced! Improving the offer will increase your chances of winning!
UnCompleteProcedure: The customer has returned the request to the debriefing stage. Reason: "{Comment}".
